typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
POH derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Month = month(OrderDate),
		Quarter = case(
    month(OrderDate)>=1 && month(OrderDate)<=3 ,'Q1',
month(OrderDate)>=4 && month(OrderDate)<=6 ,'Q2',
month(OrderDate)>=7 && month(OrderDate)<=9 ,'Q3','Q4'
)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Year,
		Month,
		Quarter),
	{avg(SubTotal)} = avg(SubTotal),
		{avg(TaxAmt)} = avg(TaxAmt),
		{avg(Freight)} = avg(Freight)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpSrc
source(output(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpTar
EmpTar select(mapColumn(
		Empid_lkp = Empid,
		Deptid_lkp = Deptid,
		Designation_lkp = Designation,
		{Reports To_lkp} = {Reports To},
		Salary_lkp = Salary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
EmpSrc, Select1 lookup(Empid == Empid_lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(Empid_lkp),
	disjoint: false) ~> Insert@(Insert, Update)
Insert@Update alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Insert@Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		Deptid,
		Designation,
		{Reports To},
		Salary
	)) ~> EmpTarSinkInsert
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Empid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		Deptid,
		Designation,
		{Reports To},
		Salary
	)) ~> EmpTarSinkUpdate

source(output(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpSrc
source(output(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpTar
EmpTar select(mapColumn(
		Empid_lkp = Empid,
		Deptid_lkp = Deptid,
		Designation_lkp = Designation,
		{Reports To_lkp} = {Reports To},
		Salary_lkp = Salary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmpTarLkp
EmpSrc, EmpTarLkp lookup(Empid == Empid_lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SrcTarCompare
SrcTarCompare alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertRecords
EmpTar, EmpSrc exists(EmpTar@Empid == EmpSrc@Empid,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesNotExistInSrc
DoesNotExistInSrc alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(Empid))) ~> Delete
UpsertRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Empid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateToEmpTar
Delete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Empid as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		Designation as string,
		{Reports To} as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Empid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		Deptid,
		Designation,
		{Reports To},
		Salary
	)) ~> DeleteFromEmpTar

source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		StartDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpSrcT2
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpTarT2
EmpSrcT2 derive(Harshkey_Src = md5(EmpName,Dept)) ~> SrcHarshKey
EmpTarT2 derive(Harshkey_Tar = md5(EmpName,Dept)) ~> TarHarshKey
SrcHarshKey, TarHarshKey exists(Harshkey_Src == Harshkey_Tar,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 derive(Active = 1,
		EndDate = toDate('1999-12-31')) ~> SetActiveEndDate
TarHarshKey, SetActiveEndDate exists(EmpTarT2@EmpID == EmpSrcT2@EmpID
	&&EmpTarT2@EmpName == EmpSrcT2@EmpName,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists derive(EndDate = toDate(currentUTC()),
		Active = 0) ~> EndDateActive
EndDateActive alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Update
SetActiveEndDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkEmpTarT2
Update sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmpTarT2Sink

source(output(
		{Survey ID} as string,
		{Store Number} as string,
		{Store Location} as string,
		{Store Setting} as string,
		Age as string,
		Exchange as string,
		{Survey Date } as string,
		VideoGames as string,
		{Academic Books} as string,
		Toys as string,
		{OutDoor SportKits} as string,
		{InDoor SportKits} as string,
		Gadgets as string,
		{NonAcademic Books} as string,
		{Number of Items Purchased} as string,
		{Total Amount of Purchases} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StudentSurvey
StudentSurvey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> StudSrveyToSnFlk

source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PurchaseOrderDetailID as integer,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(19,4),
		ReceivedQty as decimal(8,2),
		RejectedQty as decimal(8,2),
		StockedQty as decimal(9,2),
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POD
source(output(
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as boolean,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductSubcategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		rowguid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
POH, POD join(POH@PurchaseOrderID == POD@PurchaseOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PurchaseOrderID
PurchaseOrderID select(mapColumn(
		PurchaseOrderID = POH@PurchaseOrderID,
		RevisionNumber = POH@RevisionNumber,
		Status = POH@Status,
		EmployeeID = POH@EmployeeID,
		VendorID = POH@VendorID,
		ShipMethodID = POH@ShipMethodID,
		OrderDate = POH@OrderDate,
		ShipDate = POH@ShipDate,
		TaxAmt = POH@TaxAmt,
		Freight = POH@Freight,
		ModifiedDate = POH@ModifiedDate,
		PurchaseOrderID = POD@PurchaseOrderID,
		ModifiedDate = POD@ModifiedDate,
		DueDate,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		LineTotal,
		ReceivedQty,
		RejectedQty,
		StockedQty,
		RevisionNumber = POD@RevisionNumber,
		Status = POD@Status,
		EmployeeID = POD@EmployeeID,
		VendorID = POD@VendorID,
		ShipMethodID = POD@ShipMethodID,
		OrderDate = POD@OrderDate,
		ShipDate = POD@ShipDate,
		SubTotal = POD@SubTotal,
		TaxAmt = POD@TaxAmt,
		Freight = POD@Freight,
		TotalDue = POD@TotalDue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> POHPOD
POHPOD, ProductSelect join(POHPOD@ProductID == ProductSelect@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductID
Product select(mapColumn(
		ModifiedDate,
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		MakeFlag,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		Color,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		Weight,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		Class,
		Style,
		ProductSubcategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		rowguid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductSelect
ProductID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ProductOrderFactDim

sqlReaderQuery.value: select TableName,WatermarkValue from watermarktable where TableName = '[dbo].[Orders_Src]'

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Orders_Src] where OrderDate >'@{activity('StartDate').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' AND
OrderDate <= '@{activity('EndDate').output.firstRow.mdate}'
